resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75621</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75621</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>571af361-e272-4d95-98cf-40e61bc6272d#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Erdélyi karabélyosok (1680)</string>
            <string language="en">Transylvanian riflemen (1680)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transylvanian Riflemen (1680)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Riflemen de Transylvanian (1680)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Riflemen de Transylvanian (1680)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflemen di Transylvanian (1680)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τουφεκιοφόροι Transylvanian (1680)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Riflemen de Transylvanian (1680)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Pallost tartó piros ruhás tiszt és közvitéz gyalog</string>
            <string language="en">Officer dressed in red holding a sword and private infantryman</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">karabélyos Apafi Mihály nyakravaló,  </string>
            <string language="en">rifleman Mihály Apafi noose</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Offizier kleidete im Rot an, das eine Klinge und 
einen privaten Infanteristen anhält</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Officier habillé dans le rouge tenant une épée 
et un soldat d'infanterie privé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O oficial vestiu-se no vermelho que prende uma 
espada e um infantryman confidencial</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ufficiale ha vestito nella tenuta rossa una 
spada e un infantryman riservato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ανώτερος υπάλληλος έντυσε στο κόκκινο που κρατά 
ένα ξίφος και ιδιωτικό infantryman</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El oficial vistió en el rojo que sostenía a una
espada y a un soldado de infantería privado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rifleman Mihály Apafi Schleife</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">noeud coulant de Mihály Apafi de rifleman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">noose de Mihály Apafi do rifleman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">noose di Mihály Apafi del rifleman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">noose Mihαly Apafi τουφεκιοφόρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">noose de Mihály Apafi del rifleman</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75621</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=571af361-e272-4d95-98cf-40e61bc6272d&v=1&b=1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
